title: Citadel: Honey Bunny
overview: The Indian series from the world of Citadel, executive producers the Russo Brothers and filmmakers Raj and DK. When stuntman Bunny recruits struggling actress Honey for a side gig, they are hurled into a high-stakes world of action, espionage and betrayal. Years later, as their dangerous past catches up, the estranged Honey and Bunny must reunite and fight to protect their young daughter Nadia.
